title: Celestial Polki Diamond Tassel Haaram - Contemporary Classic
materials: Faceted Ruby Beads. Features Hyderabadi Kundan setting technique.
features: This exquisite haaram seamlessly blends traditional and contemporary elements. The pendant features a striking star motif crafted with meticulously set Polki diamonds. The lower half of the pendant features a cascading tassel made of lustrous freshwater pearls alternating with vibrant ruby beads, adding a touch of playful elegance. The gold chain is embellished with alternating ruby and pearl beads. The pendant also has a ruby cluster near the tassel that is held together with gold wiring.
occasions: and festive occasions. A modern twist on traditional bridal jewelry
making it suitable for both muhurtham and pre-wedding celebrations.
description: This haaram is a unique blend of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship and contemporary design. The use of uncut Polki diamonds and natural pearls adds a touch of timeless elegance, while the ruby and pearl tassel brings a modern flair. A statement piece that exudes sophistication and cultural richness.
